channel.title: First time server, problems
channel.description:
Hey guys, after following the some guides on this forum to start up my own private server, i have came across a problem.
That is, when i try to connect to my server via the 508 client, i get this error in the clients console
[code]error_game_js5connect[/code]
I am using the berky-scape server.
The server console shows this
[code]starting server on port: 43594[/code]
Thanks.

item.title: First time server, problems
item.dc:creator: @icebat icebat
item.description:
@icebat wrote:

I found the download link for the titan cache and installed it, in the standard dir (windows folder), and moved the cache508 from the client into the titana cache dir, but i just get another error.

The client console now says

Error: Sighlink:233 Sighlink:372 ...

After a search on the forum it seems quite a few other folk have this problem, but i cant find the answer, to it yet?

Anybody got any ideas?

Thanks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 26, 2009, 10:21:51 am[/size][hr]Anybody?! =([br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 26, 2009, 10:25:02 am[/size][hr]anybody got an idea how i can fix this? i am not using the titan cache to make my server HD or anything like that, i just want it be able to connect to it from the 508 client.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 26, 2009, 11:06:56 am[/size][hr]I fix the problem, i just had to connect to my localhost , 127.0.0.1â€¦

Read full topic

item.title: First time server, problems
item.dc:creator: @lol_k lol k
item.description:
@lol_k wrote:

did u dl the cache? aka titan cache i think :P, i had this problem when i started 508s then it went away or i did something, sorry about this post :P, gl
